content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the case involved a divorce between two parties referred to as gg and tg the court divided the movable property between the parties with gg receiving items such as a refrigerator gas cooker washing machine and kitchen cabinets valued at eur 430 and tg receiving items such as a refrigerator chainsaw trimmer and tool set valued at eur 460 tg was also ordered to hand over certain items needed for the children to gg the court recognized that both parties had personal debts to various creditors which were enforced through bailiffs tg was ordered to pay eur 18300 for stamp duty and eur 28500 for legal aid costs additionally the court dissolved the marriage due to faults on both sides the judgment regarding maintenance payments for the children will be enforced urgently

metadata.cost: 183.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 285.00 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
